metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Stdin - Powershell
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND script.script_content.value rlike '\(?i\)\(set\).*&&\\s?set.*\(environment|invoke|\\$\\\{?input\).*&&.*"')

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts
